function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation within interconnected supply chains.","Impact":"Disruptions in transportation, labor, and logistics affecting both exports and imports.","Mitigation":"Implementation of localized supply chains, improved transportation and logistics systems, and contingency planning for similar disruptions.","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, real-time tracking and monitoring technologies, and data analytics for supply chain optimization.","People":"Supply chain workers, exporters, importers, and local communities.","Owner":"Supply chain management companies, government agencies, and industry associations."}]}
